channel.title: Jialin Xu's Blog
channel.description: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

item.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
item.description:
You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext and includes the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.

item.title: Index
item.description:
• Home
  • About Me
  • Portfolio
  • Contact


  • BetterRead
    BetterRead is a rehabilitation training software aiming to improve the language (mainly Chinese) abilities of people with dyslexia, who has difficulties with recognizing, reading and writing word. I worked as the only designer in our team, responsible for designing the entire user interface and foreground coding. This software also won the second prize in Imagine Cup 2013 China Region.

    Click here to get more detail.

    Programming | Interaction design

  • Paint
    I love paint. In my spare time, I make digital illustrations by Photoshop and digital board, upload them to the Internet and communicate with others.

    Click here to get more detail.

    Digital artwork

  • LeTV - Smart TV Interactive Theme Design
    The difference of operating equipment between television, cell phone and PC determines their distinct interaction. Without mouse and touch screen, the UX design makes best use of remote control and avoids complicated operation.

    Click here to get more detail.

    Interaction design

About Me

Hi! I am Qiuge Zhang. I am a student from School of Information and Communication Engineering at Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunication.

 

 

 

My recent works

Here are my recentworks. To learn more about my works, please see my portfilio.

 



 

To get more information, please follow my SNS.

Contact

  • Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications
  • No.10, Xitucheng Road, Haidian District, Beijing, P.R.China, 100876
  • Telephone: +(86) 189 0111 1642
  • E-mail: qiuge.zhang.bupt@gmail.com


Copyright © qiugezhang.com. All Rights Reserved
